hero.title: DEVELOPER
hero.subtitle: Immersive Experience Developer
hero.description: Transforming ideas into <1>unique digital experiences</1>. clean code, impactful design, attention to detail.

about.title: ABOUT.exe
about.paragraph1: Developer who transforms ideas into clear and efficient interfaces, balancing performance, clean code and details that make the experience happen. [<1>excellent functionality</1> - <2>impactful visuals</2>.]

dashboard.title: VISUAL_ANALYSIS
dashboard.description: Dashboard for data visualization and analysis, including metrics and charts.
dashboard.challenge: Designing an efficient and clear data visualization structure.
dashboard.impact: Data visualization techniques and analytical dashboards.

discord.title: CONNECT_DISCORD
discord.description: Platform that allows players to find and post ads to form teams or join matches.
discord.challenge: Handling real-time data rendering and user interactions.
discord.impact: Real-time communication and scalable frontend architecture.

social.title: SERVICE_REVIEW
social.description: Application for rating services using a 1 to 5 star system.
social.challenge: Designing an intuitive and user-friendly feedback system.
social.impact: User feedback systems and usability-focused design.

contact.title: INITIATE <1>TRANSMISSION</1>
contact.message: I’m always seeking <1>new challenges</1>, knowledge, and dangerously good adventures. If you have an interesting project or want to talk tech, <2>let’s cross orbits</2>!
contact.footer: Built with <1>❤</1> and lots of coffee ☕
